verses.roman:
prabhura nṛtya prema dekhi' haya camatkāra
kṛṣṇa-prema uchalila hṛdaye sabāra

synonyms: prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nṛtya—dancing; prema—love; dekhi'-seeing; haya—become; camatkāra—astonished; kṛṣṇa-prema—love of Kṛṣṇa; uchalila—infatuated; hṛdaye—in the hearts; sabāra—of everyone.
translation: After seeing the dancing and ecstatic love of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, everyone became astonished. In their hearts they became infatuated with love of Kṛṣṇa.
